explains: n. 简单（性)，容易（性）；简朴，朴素；简单（或质朴、朴素）之处；愚蠢，无知

sentences.en: The plan has the virtue of simplicity.
sentences.cn: 这项计划的优点是简单。

sentences.en: The apparent simplicity of his plot is deceptive.
sentences.cn: 他的阴谋貌似简单，却具有欺骗性。

sentences.en: The document impressed me with its elegant simplicity.
sentences.cn: 这份文件以其精妙的简约给我留下了深刻的印象。
